subject: Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The world steeplechase champion Marta Domínguez and the doctor at the center of cycling’s biggest doping investigation were among a reported 14 people detained across Spain in a new investigation.
snippet: The world steeplechase champion Marta Domínguez and the doctor at the center of cycling’s biggest doping investigation were among a reported 14 people detained across Spain in a new investigation.
